user_query: I'm planning a beach vacation with my family and I want to calculate the carbon footprint of our flight. Can you provide me with the carbon footprint of flying to the destination? Additionally, give me information on the nutritional analysis of local fruits and vegetables at the destination.

TaskList.description: Determine the flight distance to the beach destination based on the departure and arrival locations.
Calculate the carbon footprint based on the flight distance obtained in Subtask 1 and the type of flight.
Gather data on local fruits and vegetables available at the beach destination.
Perform a nutritional analysis of the gathered fruits and vegetables from Subtask 3.
